info.objective_text: Be the first player (or duo) to move their pawn to space 10 on the board.
info.turn_text: On your turn, you can play effect cards freely and must follow the rule below for value cards. Then, pass the turn.
info.value_card_rule_1: If you have 2 or more value cards in hand, you MUST play exactly one per turn.
info.value_card_rule_2: If you have only 1 value card, you CANNOT play it. It will be locked to be used as your "Rest".
info.value_card_rule_3: The value card you play becomes your new "Rest" for the next round.
info.end_of_round_text: The round ends when all players pass their turn consecutively. The score is calculated, and pawns move.
info.end_of_round_rule_1: Winner(s): Advance 1 space. In case of a tie, no one advances.
info.end_of_round_rule_2: 'Up'/'Down' Effects: Move your pawn up or down.
info.end_of_round_rule_3: 'More'/'Less' Effects: Add or subtract your "Rest" value from your score.
info.special_card_pula: Jump: Forces an opponent to move their pawn to an empty path on the board.
info.special_card_reversus: Reversus: Inverts an effect ('More' becomes 'Less', 'Up' becomes 'Down', etc.) on a single player.
info.special_card_reversus_total: Reversus Total: The most powerful card. It inverts ALL effects on ALL players for the round (Global effect). It can also be used to apply and lock a basic effect ('More', 'Less', etc.) on a single target for one round (Individual effect).
info.field_effects_text: Stopping on colored spaces on the board activates special effects that last for the entire round!
info.credits_line_1: The game "Reversus" was created by Xael in 2023 with the theme "Race to the Altar" as a Card + Board Game, to raise funds for his wedding - and now we are on version 3.0 (08/21/2025) with many new features!
info.credits_line_2: Enjoy all the modes and functionalities:
info.credits_line_4: My special thanks to everyone who supported this project from the beginning.
info.conduct_title: Rules of Conduct and Reasons for Banning
info.conduct_intro: The user agrees not to engage in the following actions within the game, under penalty of suspension or permanent account ban:
info.conduct_item1_text: Use of profanity, insults, threats, harassment, or any type of discrimination (race, gender, religion, sexual orientation, etc.).
info.conduct_item2_text: Acts that cause discomfort to other players, including stalking, insistent messaging, or abusive behavior.
info.conduct_item3_text: Attempted fraud, scams, money laundering, sharing of illegal information, or malicious links.
info.conduct_item4_text: Use of hacks, cheats, bots, macros, or any resource that provides an unfair advantage over other players.
info.conduct_item5_text: Mass sending of messages, advertisements, external links, or any type of unauthorized marketing in the game.
info.conduct_item6_text: Commercialization, lending, or sharing of the account with third parties without official authorization.
info.conduct_item7_title: Use of inappropriate language in chat and official channels:
info.conduct_item7_text: Including any sexually explicit content, gore, incitement to hatred, or violent speech.
info.privacy_intro: By using the game, the user declares to be aware of and in agreement with the following points:
info.privacy_item1_text1: The game may collect information such as email, nickname, chat message logs, and in-game interactions.
info.privacy_item1_text2: This data is used to ensure security, prevent fraud, enforce the rules of conduct, and improve the user experience.
info.privacy_item2_title: Access to messages and internal communications
info.privacy_item2_text1: The game staff may access chats and internal emails when there is a report or suspicion of a rule violation, always respecting GDPR.
info.privacy_item2_text2: No communication will be shared with third parties without consent, except when required by law.
info.privacy_item3_text: The player can request the deletion of their personal data at any time, aware that this may result in the permanent closure of the account.
info.privacy_item4_text: By creating an account and continuing to use the game, the user fully agrees to these rules and privacy policies.
